name: Verify Report Generation System - Cerebellum Report
description: Validates that report.kp4 plays video and opens interactive report interface for planet data entry.
testObjective: Ensure report generation workflow functions correctly from video to interactive form.
author: Dominic Brooks

testData.exampleButtonOutput: Clicking 'aaa' adds three words like 'Detemeter > GFHQ'

steps.action: Run the report.kp4 file from Filesystem

steps.expected: Video finishes and Cerebellum report interface opens
Interface displays multiple button options for data entry
Clicking button adds corresponding words to the report (e.g., 'Detemeter > GFHQ')

steps.action: Click additional buttons to add more data
steps.expected: Each button click adds its associated words/data to the report

steps.action: Complete filling out all required report fields
steps.expected: Report is fully populated with planetary data
